# Packages requirements for updating the requirements.txt.freeze list via
#  make update-packages
# Deployments will use requirements.txt.freeze which is generated by make update-packages

# commandline interface
python-dotenv

# Observability
datadog

# API
requests

# WebServer
fastapi
fastapi_utils
fastapi-login
uvicorn
loguru
jinja2


# testing
pytest
pytest-cov
requests_mock

# Math
pandas
numpy

# Util
sqlalchemy
pydantic
matplotlib
tables
python-multipart
passlib
bcrypt
pendulum
pypyodbc
